channel.title: Python on Anam Raihan
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Anam Raihan

item.title: Wikipedia Search Engine
item.description: This project aimed at designing a scalable and efficient search engine using 70 GB of Wikipedia data. The search engine outputs the top certain relevant documents based on the search query.

item.title: Mini SQL Engine
item.description: A Mini-SQL engine which will run a subset of SQL queries using command line interface.

item.title: Movie Rating Predictions
item.description: The project aimed to predict and identify the major factors affected the movie ratings from the dataset provided. Useful features were extracted from classifying techniques like support vector machine

item.title: Task Management App
item.description: The project aimed at developing a webapp in python where users can assign task with resources and deadlines. Features like email reminder and collaboration of multiple people was implemented.
